title: Man Bouncing Ball

nouns: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

description: The male version of the ⛹ Person With Ball emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man bouncing a ball emoji depicts a dynamic figure in mid-action, showcasing Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges. His athletic build and focused expression, rendered with realistic lighting, suggest energy and playful engagement. This emoji is perfect for conveying enthusiasm, sportsmanship, or the excitement of an activity on Apple devices.
